New_Brunswick.Middlesex County Academy:
The Middlesex County Academy for Science, Mathematics and Engineering Technologies (also known as Edison Academy) is a four-year career academy and college preparatory magnet public high school located on the campus of the Middlesex County College in Edison, in Middlesex County, New Jersey, United States, serving students in ninth through twelfth grades as part of the Middlesex County Vocational and Technical Schools. The school serves students from all over Middlesex County.
As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 166 students and 13.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 12.8:1.
